data.Sentence_cn: 在一个乡村集市上，我决定去拜访一位称作别林斯夫人的算命人。
data.Sentence: At a village fair, I decided to visit a fortune-teller called Madam Bellinsky.

data.Sentence_cn: 我走进她的帐篷，她叫我坐下。
data.Sentence: I went into her tent and she told me to sit down.

data.Sentence_cn: 我给了她一些钱后，她便查看着一个水晶球说道：
data.Sentence: After I had given her some money, she looked into a crystal ball and said:

data.Sentence_cn: “您的一个亲戚就要来看您了。
data.Sentence: 'A relation of yours is coming to see you.

data.Sentence_cn: 她将于今天傍晚到达，并准备住上几天。
data.Sentence: She will be arriving this evening and intends to stay for a few days.

data.Sentence_cn: 您一走出这个帐篷，就会大吃一惊。
data.Sentence: The moment you leave this tent, you will get a big surprise.

data.Sentence_cn: 一位您很熟悉的女人将向您冲来。
data.Sentence: A woman you know well will rush towards you.

data.Sentence_cn: 她会对您说点什么，然后带您离开这个地方。就是这些。”
data.Sentence: She will speak to you and then she will lead you away from this place. That is all.'

data.Sentence_cn: 我一走出帐篷，就把别林斯基夫人给算卦的事忘得一干二净了，因为我的妻子正匆匆向我跑来。
data.Sentence: As soon as I went outside, I forgot all about Madam Bellinsky because my wife hurried towards me.

data.Sentence_cn: “你躲到哪儿去了？”她不耐烦地问，
data.Sentence: 'Where have you been hiding?' she asked impatiently.

data.Sentence_cn: “再有不到一个小时你姐姐就要到这儿了，我们得去车站接她。
data.Sentence: 'Your sister will be here in less than an hour and we must be at the station to meet her.

data.Sentence_cn: 当她走开时，我也跟着她出了集市。
data.Sentence: As she walked away, I followed her out of the fair.
